titles.title: Legal Services Corporation Authorization Act of 1988
A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1989 to the Legal Services Corporation to carry out the Legal Services Corporation Act, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 5/4/1988--Introduced. Legal Services Corporation Authorization Act of 1988 - Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 for the Legal Services Corporation. Sets forth restrictions on the use of such funds.
